course.subject: HUMA
course.name: The Art of Thinking in the Hong Kong Context
course.description: This course aims to provide a basic introduction to the art of thinking. The focus of this course is on methodology. Students will be equipped with critical tools for the analysis of arguments. Moreover, special attention will be given to the application of such tools to the practical affairs of everyday life.

reviews.author: Jim Jim
reviews.title: BEST COURSE IN HKUST
reviews.comment_content:
M2:語理分析、語言的陷阱
M3定義、意義判準
M4符號邏輯、對確性與論證形式
M5定言三段論
M6謬誤
reviews.comment_teaching:
前半部分個人認為上Dr Nam堂似聽電台多過真係聽lecture。
後半部分似玩腦筋急轉彎，真係要經過自己大腦思考先知道啱唔啱，非常適合中意諗無聊嘢嘅人。
reviews.comment_grading:
科大史上最好grade嘅course，沒有之一。
一開始已經講明跟absolute grade，唔拉curve。
只要做到marking scheme要求就會有高分，所以最後可以39.24%人A-range, 34.18%人B-range, 26.58人C-range
（讀咗四年未聽過可以A range人數佔最多）
（用生命在派A）
每次教完一個module會有一個quiz， open book，講明歡迎大家互相討論。
所以每次個mean都好高，但個人認為唔難，只要你跟返佢教嘅方向去思考 = 送分。
reviews.comment_workload:
雖然好似好多嘢做，但其實每個範疇要做嘅都唔太深入 (except essay)
咁樣嘅grade絕對對得住佢要求你做嘅workload
信我
btw 雖然有reading material，但其實佢無要求你睇
當然建議係睇，個人覺得已經唔算多。
attendance佢畀得好鬆手，Dr Nam知道好多人之前都學過符號邏輯，所以個堂只要上咗前半個鐘嘅都計attendance（基本上attendance = 送分）

reviews.author: Dipsy
reviews.title: 好chill 而又比較數嘅人文科，廣東話授課
reviews.comment_content:
1. M2語理分析
2. M2語言的陷阱
3. M3定義
4. M3意義判準
5. M4符號邏輯
6. M4對確性與論證形式
7. M5定言三段論
8. M6謬誤
reviews.comment_teaching:
今個sem 全部都online learning ，集中唔到精神，唯一呢科令我上得好過癮

Dr. Nam 一貫佢玩嘢嘅風格，熄咗個chat room ，有咩唔明或想分享就直接開咪，結果呢科應該係我大學四年來最interactive 嘅course，大家有問有答，有時同學會出啲奇怪例子為個course 增添趣味

有時開吓breakout room ，但有時真係唔知講咩好幾尷，呢part可能F2F 會好啲，
reviews.comment_grading:
好到不得了
一開sem Dr. Nam 就話performance base唔拉curve，如果全世界都做到marking scheme 嘅requirement 就全部A range，預咗要寫report

1. mean: 82.19 out of 100 (corresponding letter grade: B)
2. median: 86.5 out of 100(corresponding letter grade: B+)
3. s.d.: 13.82
4. % of A-range: 39.24; % of B-range: 34.18; % of C-range: 26.58

我quiz 幾乎全部踩mean, eportfolio 17/20, essay 拎highest 19/20
overall 91.5 A-
原來差少少有A呀
是但啦我讀得幾開心，啲人文科未拎過A range，更唔駛講essay

利申我係Dr Nam口中有數學同程式背景嘅人，佢話會有著數，但我個人覺得無咩著數，當啲內容唔係好複雜嘅時候人人都好容易掌握，但啲quiz無論你有無底都係好易中伏。Essay 同eportfolio 都係做到佢要求就高分，而要求只係希望呼應到課堂內容同日常生活，同數學背景無直接關係
reviews.comment_workload:
0 workload
啲quiz 24條T/F 或者啲好簡單關於符號邏輯同三段論嘅短答，但俾足三日open everything，本身識符號邏輯Dr Nam仲俾我地早退但照計attendance，quiz 都可以用以前自己學過嘅方法做，但最好問問Dr Nam 睇唔睇得明先
ePortfolio 我hea hea地將lecture notes入面啲例子舉啲新嘅出來就有17/20
essay 最多只可以寫兩頁，我認真得滯諗咗成個禮拜應該點寫，但都只係跟足佢marking scheme 啲要求咁寫。勁爽第一次人文學科寫essay 唔駛加citation

reviews.title: Dr Nam教既course點都要讀
reviews.comment_content:
module 1

Introduction: Critical Thinking & Creative Thinking 批判思考與創意思維

module 2

Logico-linguistic Analysis 語理分析

2.1. Classification of Questions 問題分類

2.2. The Pitfalls of Language 語言的陷阱

module 3

Definition and Meaning 定義與意義

3.1. Definition 定義

3.2. Meaning Criterion 意義判準

3.3. A/S Distinction 析合區分

module 4

Symbolic Logic 符號邏輯

4.1. Validity and Logical Forms 對確性與論證形式

4.2. Truth-table 真值表

4.3. Reductio ad Absurdum 歸謬法

module 5

Categorical Syllogisms 定言三斷論

5.1. Categorical Proposition 定言命題

5.2. The Square of Opposition 四角對立表

5.3. Rules Methods 檢驗規則

5.4. Venn Diagrams 范恩圖解法

module 6

Classification of Fallacies謬誤分類

reviews.comment_workload:
都好輕鬆
平時要做既野只係開zoom刷一刷attendance+4個quiz
quiz有3日時間做 可以慢慢同朋友交流
critical essay同eportfolio既rubric開sem嗰陣已經比左
essay係自己搵d野去criticize佢d邏輯謬誤
無規定最少要用幾多個module既野
sem頭教完module1覺得已經夠寫essay就可以寫左先
eportfolio如果要有A range就要有3-4個module

reviews.author: Will730
reviews.comment_content: Very meaningful course. Topics include creative thinking, logic, fallacy, paradox.
reviews.comment_teaching: Prof Yip is very humorous. She explains the concepts with great clarity and details with different real-world examples and funny stories as well as some gags. Sometimes, she will share stories and thought related and not related to the course. In short, you will never fall asleep in the class and will come to classes even if no attendance is taken.
reviews.comment_grading: The grade is worse than I think. Overall I obtain the points around mean but only get a C at last.
reviews.comment_workload: Little workload, just midterm, final and one 500-word essay.
